lines.text: So. That’s everything, right? We can speak freely, now.
Right, right. So… <c=#FF00FF>Typifacium Diminuum Non Diegesius!</c>
The heck was that?
Making the font size for whispering normal again, since we’re not whispering everything.
<f=OpenDyslexicSmall>See? Now the font is tiny when I whisper.</f>
God, we’re still doin’ that bit?
Look, ignorin’ that- you think them wizards elaborately faked their deaths so we’d leave?
<c=#FF0000>Reversing Rune,</c> <c=#0000FF>Mass Arrest Momentum,</c> <c=#FF0000>Portable Hole,</c> <c=#0000FF>Living Memory…</c> those were what they could actually use.
Combine that with the bottled blood, quick-dry concrete, and a convenient fire to hide and destroy evidence…
...they set up this whole scene to make us think everyone was dead, and our job was done!
Seems like a mess of a plan. Lot of weird stuff around that gave it away, huh?
Well, they only had, what, twenty minutes after the gunshot to come up with something, right?
And, uh, it doesn’t look like they were very smart.
Still, assumin’ you’re right, we almost got fooled.
Well, they couldn’t have counted on it, but they had some outside help with their plan.
Huh?
The first person on the scene figured out their trick pretty quick, I bet.
But they wanted to discredit the real investigation, so they helped cover up the dead giveaways.
Once the cops looked around and found nothing, they’d claim to have solved it themselves, and get one up on the detective.
Isn’t that right, Dr. Whydah?
...I don’t know what you’re talking about.
Do you really think I’d- that someone would need to set something up to make Leo look bad?
He’s an incompetent. All you need to do to make him look bad is let him open his mouth.
Gee, Opal. Why don’t you tell us how you really feel?
Uh, let’s not-
No, you know what? You want the truth?
This buffoon doesn’t deserve his position.
It’s- it’s nepotism! He’s the chief’s husband! She- she…
He stole her from me! This- this idiot!
...is that what this is about? I almost thought you had a more professional reason for hatin’ on me.
OF COURSE THAT’S WHAT THIS IS ABOUT
You STOLE what I DESERVED!
...Yeah, this is goin’ to HR.
No! This- this is between YOU and ME, Fleini!
It really ain’t, Whydah. It’s between me and Patty.
(Uh, should I really be listening to this?)
It was her decision to get away from someone who was makin’ her miserable.
LIAR! She- she LOVED me!
And you flushed all that love down the toilet, ‘cause you felt threatened by her accomplishments.
A relationship ain’t a contest. When she got promoted to chief, I didn’t try to tell her she hadn’t earned it.
Uh… guys? Do we really need all this third-act drama, here?
It’s kind of coming out of nowhere, and we just-
Quiet, wizard! This doesn’t concern you!
...you’re right, Whydah. It doesn’t concern %THEM%.
Let’s not waste %THEIR% time. We can see how Patty feels about keepin’ you on the force after this later.
Right now... Seeker.
Yeah?
If you’re right, then statue man’s probably real nervous hearin’ we figured him out.
There’s a team outside to grab him if he runs, but he’s got that <c=#0000FF>Mass Arrest Momentum</c> spell, right?
I bet he freezes anyone who tries to stop him. Meanin’ we need a plan of action, here.
